name: The Fear Trials
description:
You are stuck inside a house of a missing family, something is hunting you. Use the items you find to break out of the house. You have 5 days.

Horror Game Inspired from the Popular Mobile Horror Series Granny.

Patch Notes:

1.0: Official Release

1.1: Fixed bug where you cant be killed, added a skip start scene option. Fixed other small bugs

1.2: Small bug fixes

1.3: Improved the AI

Info:

This is my first game, it took 6 months of development. Please give any feedback and report any bugs you find!
